article:
:This is an incomplete list, which can or may never satisfy any subjective
standard for completeness. Revisions and additions are welcome.  The following is a list of 'prominent and famous
people who are Hindus'.


]] Bhosale ]]




















]] ]] ]] ]] ]] ]]
* Abhinavagupta: Exponent of Kashmir Saivism
* Agastyar: Saint, First and foremost person of Siddha
* Kripalu Maharaj: Krishna Bhakti founder of jagadgurukripalu parishad
* Aksapada Gautama: author of Nyaya Sutras, the foundation of the Nyaya school
  of Hinduism
* Annie Besant: Theosophist and president of the Congress Party
* Sri Aurobindo: Mystic and philosopher
* Auvaiyar: Beloved Tamil female saint
* A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada: Founder-acharya of
  ISKCON [http://www.iskcontruth.com ISKCON TRUTH]- Publishing the inside
  stories of iskcon.--->[http://www.iskcontruth.com www.iskcontruth.com]
* Acharya Koshalendraprasad Pande Acharya of Ahmedabad Gadi of the Swaminarayan
  Sampraday
* Acharya Rakeshprasad Pande Acharya of Vadtal Gadi of the Swaminarayan
  Sampraday
* Bharata: Advocated Advaita philosophy, Bharat, the other name for India, is
  named after him
* Bhartrihari: Author of Vairagya Satakam, hundred verses of renunciation
* Bhaskararaya: Author of Varivasya Rahasyam
* Bogar: Legendary South Indian Siddhar. Created Lord Murugan statue in Palani.
* Kautilya Chanakya: Philosopher,Social Reformer, Economist, Politician,
  Administrator, Author of Artha shastra
* Krishna Chandra Bhattacharya: Philosopher
* Kanakadasa:Greatest Saint of Bhakti movement.
* Swami Chinmayananda: Religious leader
* Deepak Chopra: Personality Development Author
* Ananda Coomaraswamy: Art historian
* Dattatreya: Narrated Jnana Kanda, taught Ashtanga Yoga to Patanjali
* Swami Dayananda: Religious leader
* Shri Madhvacharya: Philosopher Saint
* Narayana Guru: Mystic and philosopher
* Nigamananda: Yogi,Philosopher Saint
* Nisargadatta Maharaj: Teacher
* Patanjali: Founder of Patanjali Yoga
* Ram Dass: American spiritual leader
* Ramana Maharshi: Mystic
* Ram Mohan Roy: Reformer
* Sri Ramakrishna Paramhansa: Philosopher Saint, Social reformer
* Ramanuja: Philosopher Saint
* Dr. Rajeev Menon, Hindu Rashtrapathy, Hindu Mahasabha spiritual Leader
* Sant Sri Asaramji Bapu: Saint & Spiritual preceptor
* Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan: Vedantic Philosopher
* Shankaracharya of Kanchi, Hindu Seer & Spiritual preceptor
* Shriram Sharma Acharya: Founder of the All World Gayatri Pariwar
* Swami Sivananda: Yogi
* Sivaya Subramuniyaswami: Modern sage
* Thirumoolar: One of the 18 Siddhars
* Sage Valmiki: Author of the epic Ramayana
* Swami Vivekananda: Philosopher Saint, Social reformer
* Sri Sri Ravishankar: Spiritual Guru, Founder of the Art of Living Foundation
* Swami Sathyananda Saraswathi: Jagadguru,Reckoned as the greatest Karmayogi to
  uphold Sanatana Dharma since Swami Vivekananda
* Vyasa: Author of the epic Mahabharata
* Paramahansa Yogananda: Yogi
* Purandara Dasa: Father of Carnatic music & philosopher
* yogiraj maharaj paithankar: Spiritual Guru, 14th Generation of sant eknath.
* Tibbetibaba: Philosopher Saint
